'''''To Bee, Or Not to Bee!''''' is the fourth installment of the ''[[Minecraft: Stonesword Saga]]'' series, authored by [[Nick Eliopulos]].

== Synopsis ==
{{quote|Based on the most popular video game of all time, this all-new chapter book series takes a group of intrepid [[Minecraft]] players deeper into the game than ever before. This time, [[Harper Houston|Harper]] and her friends tackle a real-life ecological crisis. The bees around their school and the [[Stonesword Library]] are disappearing—and a splinter of the [[Evoker King]] has taken on the form of a [[bee colony]] with a hive mind! Could there be a connection with the [[The Fault|rip]] they’ve seen growing bigger and darker in the Minecraft [[sky]]? And will their actions make things better or worse? Find out in the next amazing instalment of the Minecraft Stonesword Chapter Book series.|author=Description<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/705372/to-bee-or-not-to-bee-minecraft-stonesword-saga-4-by-nick-eliopulos-illustrated-by-random-house/|title=To Bee, Or Not to Bee! (Minecraft Stonesword Saga #4)|website=Penguin Random House}}</ref>}}
